description: Context map documenting all feature modules and their file locations in the Vibeman codebase

contexts.title: Blueprint Scanning Core
contexts.summary: Core blueprint scanning system for comprehensive project analysis including framework detection, scan orchestration, and adapter pattern for different tech stacks.

contexts.title: Blueprint Context Scans
contexts.summary: Specialized scan types for context generation including photo scanning, test design, code review, and context-based analysis.

contexts.title: Onboarding Flow
contexts.summary: Project onboarding wizard including getting started panels, control panel, goal drawer, and task item management.

contexts.title: Context Management
contexts.summary: Core context CRUD operations, context cards, menus, and file tree selection for organizing code into business domains.

contexts.title: Context Detail Views
contexts.summary: Detailed context views including files, headers, info panels, related contexts, and timeline visualization.

contexts.title: Context Generation
contexts.summary: AI-powered context generation forms, file selection, editing modals, and context groups with color coding.

contexts.title: Context Testing & Preview
contexts.summary: Context overview with test scenarios, preview management, target generation, and selector APIs for automated testing.

contexts.title: Ideas Core System
contexts.summary: Main ideas layout, detail modals, filtering, and core idea management with project/context selection.

contexts.title: Ideas Scanning & Generation
contexts.summary: Scan initiation, type selection, Claude integration, prompt editing, and LLM provider selection for idea generation.

contexts.title: Ideas Lifecycle & Buffer
contexts.summary: Idea lifecycle dashboard with phase indicators, configuration, and buffer view for idea management workflow.

contexts.title: Ideas Evaluation (Tinder)
contexts.summary: Swipe-based idea evaluation interface with cards, controls, and LLM-powered evaluation for selecting best ideas.

contexts.title: RefactorWizard Core
contexts.summary: Main refactoring wizard layout, progress tracking, step routing, and core wizard infrastructure.

contexts.title: RefactorWizard Steps
contexts.summary: Individual wizard steps including scan, review, plan, package, settings, results, and execute phases.

contexts.title: RefactorWizard AI Analysis
contexts.summary: AI-powered analysis including package generation, pattern detection, DSL building, and strategic requirement generation.

contexts.title: Annette Voice Assistant Core
contexts.summary: Main voice assistant panel, audio handling, session management, and response caching system.

contexts.title: Annette Insights & Knowledge
contexts.summary: Insights panel, knowledge sources, live event ticker, context HUD, and scan briefing services.

contexts.title: Annette AI Tools
contexts.summary: Voice assistant tool integrations including event listener, goal evaluator, implementation log, and file operations.

contexts.title: TaskRunner Batch Execution
contexts.summary: Batch task execution system with dual panels, task columns, remote batch display, and execution management.

contexts.title: TaskRunner Git & Screenshots
contexts.summary: Git control integration, screenshot capture, and configuration toolbars for task execution.

contexts.title: Goals Management
contexts.summary: Goal lifecycle management with modals, forms, implementation logs, and screen catalog.

contexts.title: Manager Goal Hub
contexts.summary: Goal hub dashboard with panels, progress tracking, hypothesis management, and activity feeds.

contexts.title: Manager Cards & System Map
contexts.summary: Manager card grid, system map visualization, task input panels, and implementation log views.

contexts.title: Social Kanban Board
contexts.summary: Kanban board for communication management with cards, columns, stats bar, and drag state handling.

contexts.title: Social Card Types
contexts.summary: Different social card content types including chat, email, Facebook, Instagram, reviews, and X (Twitter).

contexts.title: Social Activity & Features
contexts.summary: Activity panel, filters, SLA tracking, swimlanes view, and GitHub integration.

contexts.title: Social Discovery & Config
contexts.summary: Social channel configuration, discovery panels for Twitter/X, and tweet selection features.

contexts.title: Reflector Dashboard
contexts.summary: Ideas analysis dashboard with filters, status tracking, and total view with project/context sections.

contexts.title: Reflector Analytics & Insights
contexts.summary: Reflection analytics with executive summary, effort/impact matrix, KPI cards, and insight generation.

contexts.title: Reflector Constellation & Weekly
contexts.summary: Constellation view, focused project view, weekly dashboard with daily activity and specialist breakdowns.

contexts.title: Docs Architecture Analysis
contexts.summary: Documentation and architecture analysis with system maps, module explorer, and navigation breadcrumbs.

contexts.title: Docs Impact Simulator & X-Ray
contexts.summary: Impact analysis panel, simulation system map, and X-Ray hot paths visualization.

contexts.title: Tech Debt Management
contexts.summary: Technical debt radar, cards, detail modals, health score gauges, and plugin-based scanning.

contexts.title: Debt Prediction & ROI
contexts.summary: Predictive debt analysis, opportunity cards, health gauges, and ROI simulation.

contexts.title: Blueprint Composer
contexts.summary: Blueprint composition with chain builder, component columns, decision nodes, and trigger selection.

contexts.title: Claude Code Integration
contexts.summary: Claude Code requirement management, execution pipeline, context auto-update, and execution queue.

contexts.title: Scan Queue Management
contexts.summary: Background scan queue with progress tracking, notifications, and worker management.

contexts.title: Code Tree Navigation
contexts.summary: Tree view for code navigation with search, suggestions, and code preview modals.

contexts.title: Dependencies Management
contexts.summary: Dependency scanning, security pipeline, direct upgrades, and PR automation for package management.

contexts.title: Architecture Evolution
contexts.summary: Architecture tracking with graph visualization, drift detection, and AI-powered suggestions.

contexts.title: Project Health & Security
contexts.summary: Project health dashboard, security intelligence, vulnerability breakdown, and risk scoring.

contexts.title: Autonomous CI/CD
contexts.summary: Continuous integration dashboard with pipeline management, build status, and history tracking.

contexts.title: Daily Standup Reports
contexts.summary: Daily standup dashboard with summary cards, stats, blockers, and history tracking.

contexts.title: Proposals Management
contexts.summary: Proposal panel with cards, headers, content sections, and action buttons for proposal workflow.

contexts.title: Pattern Marketplace
contexts.summary: Pattern library marketplace with browsing, favorites, profile badges, and community recommendations.

contexts.title: Storybook Component Gallery
contexts.summary: Component documentation gallery with list view, detail panels, and coverage charts.

contexts.title: Strategic Roadmap
contexts.summary: Roadmap planning with timeline visualization, headers, and initiative detail panels.

contexts.title: Onboarding Accelerator
contexts.summary: Learning path system with module cards, quiz panels, and code walkthrough viewer.

contexts.title: Test Generation
contexts.summary: Automated test scenario generation with Playwright integration and scenario analysis.

contexts.title: LLM Provider Integration
contexts.summary: Unified LLM manager with multi-provider support (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Ollama) and token tracking.

contexts.title: Database Layer
contexts.summary: Multi-database driver pattern with SQLite/PostgreSQL support, migrations, and repository utilities.

contexts.title: Core Repositories
contexts.summary: Database repositories for contexts, ideas, goals, scans, and implementation logs.

contexts.title: File System Operations
contexts.summary: File system interface, file watcher, disk operations, and dependency scanning utilities.

contexts.title: Project Management
contexts.summary: Project CRUD, configuration, analysis, and real-time synchronization across components.

contexts.title: UI State Management
contexts.summary: Zustand stores for UI concerns including themes, tooltips, badges, focus mode, and decision queue.

contexts.title: API Utilities
contexts.summary: API helper functions, error handling, validation, logging, and common response patterns.
